section.title: Resource Adaptor Interface
section.para: The &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor interface, of type org.mobicents.slee.ra.httpclient.ratype.HttpClientResourceAdaptorSbbInterface, which an SBB uses to create new HttpClientActivity instances or get access the managed HTTP Client, to send synchronous requests or change its parameters, its interface is defined as follows:

listitem.para: Retrieves the params from the client managed by the RA

The first parameter "request" is the request to execute. The "context" parameter is optional and is used on the request execution. The "applicationData" parameter is optional and it is a data object provided by the application to be returned in the response event.

The first parameter "target" is for the target host during a request. The implementation may accept null if the route can still be determined. This can be in the context of a default target or by inspecting the request.
